title: Peter Frankopan on global history in 2020
itunes:title: Peter Frankopan on global history in 2020
itunes:subtitle: Peter Frankopan explores some of the major themes in global history and how they relate to life in 2020. Historyextra.com/podcast
description:
Five years after the publication of his landmark book The Silk Roads: A New History of the World, historian Peter Frankopan explores some of the major themes in global history and how they relate to life in 2020. Historyextra.com/podcast

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
